responses: What can I do for you?

patterns: things I can do with this
responses:
I'm an Intelligent chat bot that can answer your questions about the club :)! Try typing questions! 
Some examples of things I can answer: 'when's the next event?', 'when are meetings?', 'I need help with the club'

BWiSE is a club aiming to support underrepresented groups in STEM by creating a safe space and a positive community :). We host events aligned with this purpose in mind, so stay in touch with us to learn more!.
Our general interest meetings are every other Monday from 2-3pm on our Discord server! Pop in to talk to BWiSE officers about any questions or suggestions you have
We currently don't have events coming up. But some our past events included speaker panels, movie screenings, and we have lots more planned out this year!

patterns: I want to speak to an officer
I need to contact an officer
responses: Our email is bothellwise@gmail.com. You can also send us messages on Presence or DM us directly on any of our social media platforms!

patterns: Who are the officers of BWiSE?
responses:
